Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: Redbrick has a 40-year experience in the real estate business and is a pioneer in the coworking scene in India. Redbrick have approximately 2M sq.ft under our management that is spread across Mumbai, Pune, Hyderabad, Chennai, Bangalore.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: Multiple co-working spaces available in a prime location at Lodha Supremus

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: Redbrick Prime is a beautiful coworking space in the only Grade A commercial office space for rent in Thane. This iconic piece of architecture is perfect for a coworking office space as it offers spectacularly clear vistas, natural lighting, enhanced ambiance and external spaces making it a environment friendly location.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: WorkAmp 59 offers 2 floors of co-working space with the capacity to accommodate over 200 people comfortably.
